data.name: RPG Maker MV - Modern Urban Tileset
data.detailed_description:
From clean modern hotel entrances to bright modern casinos, there's always a need for that sleek modern element.

Created by Sherman3D, this classy tile pack is an excellent add-on to the existing RPG Maker MV material. With an emphasis on clean lines and essential objects, this pack will help you create that perfect light and airy feeling of modernity. Modern Urban Tileset includes objects and textures needed to create a hotel entrance, a modern casino and a modern boxing or wrestling ring.

Features:
  • Auto-tiles A2, A4 and A5, with recolors for more diversity.
  • Complete Tile B, with various modern objects and details.
  • Tile C, with a dazzling boxing/wrestling ring.
  • Ready to use in RPG Maker MV.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
